name: Three Lives!!
description:
This is my Three lives!! project:

Modifications:

1. Complete creates a comprehensive and coherent level.

2. Changed some out-of-game menus.

3. Replace some sound effects in the game and update the game's sound design.

4. Add more new enemies with different health.

5. Add new and more obstacles.

6. Changed some of the scene details, now the scene is not so monotonous.

Credits:

Created by Qihao Zhou
